name: DroidWeather
body:
### DroidWeather
Welcome to the project page for the DroidWeather Android app. Details on my development of the app will be described here. The source code for my project can be downloaded in a tar.gz or zip file, and can be viewed and edited using the Eclipse IDE (with the Android Developer Tools plugin installed). For instructions on setting up the Android SDK and your IDE, visit the [Android Developer site](https://developer.android.com/tools/index.html).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
